snippet: A man who made threatening and obscene phone calls to hundreds of women has been sentenced to six years in prison.   The man, Steven Imler, a 38-year-old resident of Lakewood, received two years less than the maximum sentence on Friday from Judge ...
lead_paragraph: A man who made threatening and obscene phone calls to hundreds of women has been sentenced to six years in prison. The man, Steven Imler, a 38-year-old resident of Lakewood, received two years less than the maximum sentence on Friday from Judge Frederick A. Jones of Ventura County Superior Court.

headline.main: Californian Gets 6 Years for Obscene Phone Calls
